column2: Categorical indicator for which shift the staffing data applies to.
Count of nurses scheduled and present for the given date and shift.
Count of doctors or attending physicians on shift.
Number of specialty providers available on-call during the shift (e.g., cardiologists, surgeons).
Total number of ER beds available during the shift. May fluctuate across shifts to reflect operational adjustments.
Number of beds allocated to the Fast-Track area used for low-acuity (Level 4) cases. Reduced during evening shifts to simulate operational cost-saving decisions.
